Function reference

Spacial simulation interface

Spacial simulation classes and methods

annotate_forest()
Annotate a plot of cell divisions.
bbox_sampler()
Bounding box sampler
load_samples_forest
Load a samples forest from a file
TissueRectangle$new
Build a new rectangle of tissue.
TissueRectangle$lower_corner
The lower corner of the tissue rectangle.
TissueRectangle$upper_corner
The lower corner of the tissue rectangle.
TissueRectangle
A rectangle in the tissue
SamplesForest$get_coalescent_cells
Retrieve most recent common ancestors
SamplesForest$get_nodes
Get the nodes of the forest
SamplesForest$get_samples_info
Retrieve information about the samples
SamplesForest$get_species_info
Gets the species
SamplesForest$get_sticks
Compute the forest sticks
SamplesForest$get_subforest_for
Build a subforest using as leaves some of the original samples
SamplesForest$save
Save a samples forest in a file
SamplesForest
The forest of the sampled cell ancestors.
Simulation$add_mutant
Adds a mutant and its species
Simulation$schedule_mutation
Schedules a mutant mutation
Simulation$choose_cell_in
Chooses one cell in a mutant
Simulation$death_activation_level
The number of cells that activates cell death in a species.
Simulation$duplicate_internal_cells
Enable/disable duplication for internal cells.
Simulation$history_delta
The delta time between time series samples
Simulation$get_added_cells
Gets the cells manually added to the simulation
Simulation$get_cell
Gets one of the tissue cells
Simulation$get_cells
Gets the tissue cells
Simulation$get_clock
Gets the simulated time
Simulation$get_count_history
Gets the history of the number of cells per species
Simulation$get_counts
Counts the number of cells
Simulation$get_firings
Gets the number of fired events
Simulation$get_firing_history
Gets the history of the number of fired events
Simulation$get_lineage_graph
Gets the simulation lineage graph
Simulation$get_name
Gets the simulation name
Simulation$get_rates
Get the rates of a species
Simulation$get_samples_forest
Get the samples forest
Simulation$get_samples_info
Retrieve information about the samples
Simulation$get_species
Gets the species
Simulation$get_tissue_name
Gets the tissue name
Simulation$get_tissue_size
Gets the size of the simulated tissue
Simulation$mutate_progeny
Generate a mutated progeny
Simulation$new
Constructs a new Simulation
Simulation$place_cell
Place one cell in the tissue
Simulation$run_up_to_event
Simulates cell evolution
Simulation$run_up_to_size
Simulates cell evolution
Simulation$run_up_to_time
Simulates cell evolution
Simulation$sample_cells
Sample a tissue rectangle region.
Simulation$search_sample
Search a rectangular sample containing a minimum number of cells
Simulation$update_tissue
Update tissue name and size
Simulation$update_rates
Update the rates of a species
Simulation
Simulates the cell evolution on a tissue
plot_exposure_timeline()
Plot a signatures exposures
plot_firings()
Plot the number of stochastic events in the simulation.
plot_forest()
Plot samples cell division forest.
plot_muller()
Plot a muller plot
plot_state()
Plot the current state of the simulation.
plot_tissue()
Plot a tissue
plot_timeseries()
Plot the current state of the simulation.
recover_simulation
Load a simulation

Mutation simulation interface

Mutation simulation classes and methods

Amplification
Create a CNA amplification.
build_mutation_engine
Create a mutation engine object
CNA$get_allele
Get the allele in which CNA occurs.
CNA$get_chromosome
Get the chromosome in which the CNA occurs.
CNA$get_dataframe
Get a data frame representing the CNA.
CNA$get_length
Get the CNA length.
CNA$get_position_in_chromosome
Get the position in chromosome where the CNA occurs.
CNA$get_src_allele
Get the allele from which CNA is copied.
CNA
Create a CNA amplification.
Deletion
Create a CNA deletion.
get_mutation_engine_codes
Get the supported codes for predefined set-up
load_phylogenetic_forest
Load a phylogenetic forest from a file
MutationEngine$add_exposure
Add an exposure to the mutation engine.
MutationEngine$add_mutant
Add a mutant specification to the mutation engine.
MutationEngine$get_active_germline
Get a data frame describing the active germline subject
MutationEngine$get_germline_subjects
Get a data frame reporting the available germline subjects
MutationEngine$get_population_descritions
Get a data frame containing the population descriptions
MutationEngine$get_SBSs
Get a data frame containing the available SBSs
MutationEngine$infinite_sites_model
A flag to enable/disable the infinite sites model.
MutationEngine$place_mutations
Place the mutations on a samples forest
MutationEngine$set_germline_subject
Set the germline subject
MutationEngine
Mutation engines generate phylogenetic forests
PhylogeneticForest$get_coalescent_cells
Retrieve most recent common ancestors
PhylogeneticForest$get_exposures
Gets the timed exposure data frame
PhylogeneticForest$get_first_occurrences
Gets the identifier of the cell in which a mutation occurs for the first time
PhylogeneticForest$get_germline_subject
Gets the germline subject name
PhylogeneticForest$get_germline_SNVs
Gets the SNVs of the germline
PhylogeneticForest$get_nodes
Get the nodes of the forest
PhylogeneticForest$get_samples_info
Retrieve information about the samples
PhylogeneticForest$get_sampled_cell_CNAs
Gets the CNAs of the sampled cells
PhylogeneticForest$get_sampled_cell_SNVs
Gets the SNVs of the sampled cells
PhylogeneticForest$get_species_info
Gets the species
PhylogeneticForest$get_sticks
Compute the forest sticks
PhylogeneticForest$get_subforest_for
Build a subforest using as leaves some of the original samples
PhylogeneticForest$save
Save a phylogenetic forest in a file
PhylogeneticForest
The phylogenetic forest of cells in samples.
SNV$get_alt_base
Get the base after the SNV occurs.
SNV$get_cause
Get the SNV cause.
SNV$get_chromosome
Get the chromosome in which the SNV occurs.
SNV$get_dataframe
Get a data frame representing the SNV.
SNV$get_ref_base
Get the reference base in which the SNV occurs.
SNV$get_position_in_chromosome
Get the position in chromosome where the SNV occurs.
SNV
A single nucleotide variation

Sequencing simulation interface

Sequencing simulation methods

simulate_seq
Simulate the sequencing of the samples in a phylogenetic forest
simulate_normal_seq
Simulate the sequencing of the samples in a phylogenetic forest
